main_text:
Feminist Analyses of Particular Areas of Biological Research
3. Feminist Analyses of Particular Areas of Biological Research


This section focuses on two areas of biological research that have
received extensive feminist analysis, sexual selection theory, and
sociobiology and evolutionary psychology.
section_title: 3. Feminist Analyses of Particular Areas of Biological Research
